aboutMeDescOne: "While working in a call center at Fidelity Investments, I had the opportunity to educate thousands of IBM employees about their health insurance amongst many other job-related benefits. Through casual conversation about their roles and programming in general, I became motivated to pursue a career in computer programming. After some soul-searching and research, I discovered a coding bootcamp offered at UNC Chapel Hill. I read stories about others who had found success through hard work and time commitment.
aboutMeDescTwo: Fast-forward to now, I am a Full Stack Web Developer located in Apex, NC working out of the Research Triangle area eager to start a new adventure designing and maintaining the complexities of your applications."
